availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, preacher. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth A. Morgan. Father of Simon Morgan, Nancy Morgan, Juliet Morgan, Elizabeth Morgan, Helen Ann Morgan, Bidsey Morgan, Virginia Morgan, Leanna Morgan, Eliza Morgan, and Missourie Morgan.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 39.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Greencastle, p. 17.
Find A Grave, "Rev Levi Buchanan Morgan (August 18, 1809-April 3, 1884)," Memorial #21577676, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21577676 (accessed August 16, 2018).
